lines.text: Enter two Senators and a Messenger

lines.speaker: messenger
lines.text: have spoke the least: Besides, his expedition promises Present approach.

lines.speaker: second senator
lines.text: We stand much hazard, if they bring not Timon.

lines.speaker: messenger
lines.text: I met a courier, one mine ancient friend Whom, though in general part we were opposed, Yet our old love made a particular force, And made us speak like friends: this man was riding From Alcibiades to Timons cave, With letters of entreaty, which imported His fellowship i the cause against your city, In part for his sake moved.

lines.speaker: third senator
lines.text: No talk of Timon, nothing of him expect. The enemies drum is heard, and fearful scouring Doth choke the air with dust: in, and prepare: Ours is the fall, I fear our foes the snare.
